panels.content:
![kibanasrc](img/prelert/prelert-logo.png)

#### Welcome to the Anomaly Detective Engine Dashboard
panels.title: Dashboard Home

panels.content:
###About

Prelert is 100% self-learning so it provides value in minutes. No rules, models or thresholds to create and maintain. No days, weeks or months of implementation and 'training the algorithms.' Spend less time mining your data and more time building new capabilities.

This Kibana-based UI comes with two Prelert dashboards, allowing you to view the details of your Engine API jobs and to explore the results of the analytics. You can see how the the anomaly score varies over the time range of each API job and a table of all the anomalies detected in your data.

####[Step 1: Quick Start Guide](http://www.prelert.com/docs/engine_api/latest/quick-start.html)
Follow the guide to upload a dataset and analyze

####[Step 2: View Jobs](index.html#/dashboard/file/prelert_api_jobs.json)
View the status of all your Anomaly Detective Engine jobs

####[Step 3: View Results](index.html#/dashboard/file/prelert_api_results.json)
View the Anomaly Detective Engine results dashboard
panels.title: Welcome

panels.title: Help

panels.content:
#####Already an experienced Kibana user?
Build your own dashboard to explore the results of your Anomaly Detective Engine jobs by using:

- [Sample Dashboard](index.html#/dashboard/file/guided.json) *I don't have much data yet, please extract some basics for me*
- [Unconfigured Dashboard](index.html#/dashboard/file/noted.json) *I have a lot of data and I don't want Kibana to query it at once*
- [Default Kibana Dashboard](index.html#/dashboard/file/kibana_default.json) *I'm comfortable figuring it out on my own*
panels.title: Kibana
